sentence.Network_en: One should not approach life materialistically.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何人都不应该用唯物主义的观点来对待生活.

sentence.Network_en: At the third part, it analyses the reasons the Supplement to Morning News can succeed materialistically.
sentence.Network_cn: 文章第三部分功利性地分析了《晨报副刊》之所以成功的所在.

sentence.Network_en: Happiness purifies our soul, and pales those who are materialistically prosperous yet spiritually vacuous.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸福净化灵魂, 并让那些在物质上富足,然精神却很空洞的人黯然失色.

list.abs: 14.materialistic society物质社会 However in todays materialistic society as.

pluralism 多元论materialistic monism 物质一元论Material Monism 物质一元论
One ' s materialistic happiness is dependant on one ' s economic success , though not completely ., 一方面 , 一个人的物质幸福依赖于经济上的成功 , 不是依赖.
